SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Enemy
The Enemy class represents an enemy entity in the game, extending the Entity class.
EnemySpawner
Class responsible for spawning random enemies.
Entity
The Entity class represents a general entity in the game.
FightController
Handles the combat mechanics between the player and enemies.
FightView
Responsible for displaying information about the fight and its results.
GameController
GameController class that handles game flow logic.
InvalidNameException
Custom exception class used to handle invalid player names.
Inventory
The Inventory class represents the player's collection of items in the game.
IOController
The IOController class handles input/output operations for displaying various game objects like players, enemies, and inventory.
Item
Represents an item with a name and quantity.
MyFirstMVP
he main class for the MyFirstMVP application.
NPC
The NPC class represents a non-player character in the game.
Player
Represents a player in the game, extending the Entity class.
PlayerDisplay
Represents the display for a player in the game.
Weapon
Represents a weapon in the game, extending the Item class.
WeaponDisplayInfo
Represents the display information for a weapon in the game.
